titles.title: Calling upon the Secretary of State to instruct the American Embassy and Consular officials throughout the world to convey the concern of the American people over the desecration of the dead and to assist groups and individuals who seek to protect the integrity of cemeteries and the repose of the dead.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/25/1994--Introduced. Calls upon the Secretary of State to instruct American Embassy and Consular officials throughout the world to convey the concern of the American people over the desecration of the dead and to assist groups and individuals who seek to protect the integrity of cemeteries and the repose of the dead.
